display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=3% oxygen desaturation or arousal
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >= 3% oxygen desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba3 + hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 + carba3 + caroa3 + canba3 + canoa3 + oarba3 + oaroa3 + oanba3 + oanoa3 ) / slpprdp
